alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOWER AND SOUTH CENTRAL DODGE COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hayfield, or 13 miles northeast of Austin, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Grand Meadow around 710 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads 1 And 15, Sargeant, Taopi, County Roads 1 And 7, Highways 63 And 16, Dexter and County Roads 4 And 8. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 187 and 202. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
